title: Place Block
description: Allows an entity to place blocks in the world

affected_by_griefing_rule.title: Affected By Griefing Rule
affected_by_griefing_rule.description: If true, whether the goal is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

can_place.title: Can Place
can_place.description: Filters for if the entity should try to place its block. Self and Target are set.

chance.title: Chance
chance.description: Chance each tick for the entity to try and place a block.

on_place.title: On Place
on_place.description: Trigger ran if the entity does place its block. Self, Target, and Block are set.

placeable_carried_blocks.title: Placeable Carried Blocks
placeable_carried_blocks.description: Block descriptors for which blocks are valid to be placed from the entity's carried item, if empty all blocks are valid.

randomly_placeable_blocks.title: Randomly Placeable Blocks
randomly_placeable_blocks.description: Weighted block descriptors for which blocks should be randomly placed, if empty the entity will try to place its carried block from placeable_carried_blocks.

items.title: Weight
items.description: Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

xz_range.title: XZ Range
xz_range.description: XZ range from which the entity will try and place blocks in.

y_range.title: Y Range
y_range.description: Y range from which the entity will try and place blocks in.
